Title: The Bridges of Madison County
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Meryl Streep, Annie Corley, Victor Slezak
Plot: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 17 nominations.
Production: Warner Bros., Malpaso Company, Amblin Entertainment
